mapper.insert:
insert into owe_all_tmp (groupid,user_state, user_name,融合固话, 客户标识 ,account_name, account_state, stattime, bill_one, bill_two, bill_three, bill_three_id, bill_three_qf) values
(#{item.groupid}, #{item.user_state}, #{item.user_name}, #{item.融合固话}, #{item.客户标识}, #{item.account_name}, #{item.account_state}, #{item.stattime}, #{item.bill_one}, #{item.bill_two}, #{item.bill_three}, #{item.bill_three_id}, #{item.bill_three_qf} )
mapper.select: SELECT lid id, lsum,ltime,nsum,ntime,lsum sum,ltime time FROM owe_${table}_view_last LEFT JOIN owe_${table}_view_now ON lid=nid
